title: Undesired behavior of log playback when mixing Step + Seek

content.raw:
It can be reproduced as follows:

* Start a log  playback
* Pause the log playback
* Step the log playback it for a given amount of time
* While the Step request is still being served (playback is running), request a Seek with a destine time that is back or beyond the target time of the step.

This will cause the playback to go to the destine time requested by the Seek, but to ignore the previously requested Step, making the playback to run until the end of the simulation playback.
